segments.text: I notice the woman is so focused on that plate, and it’s making me smile.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is just pouring out, and she doesn’t even notice.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The kids are being so sneaky, and I think it’s adorable.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is standing on that stool like a little adventurer.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just waiting for her cookie, and it’s the sweetest thing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think they’re going to get away with it, and that’s wonderful.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is making a mess, but it’s not their problem right now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene is so full of life and mischief, and I love it.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I love how the garden outside looks so peaceful compared to the chaos inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman is completely oblivious, and it’s making the scene even funnier.
segments.speaker: PAR
